data.title: Guardians notes: Angel Martinez recalled from Triple-A Columbus to make MLB debut
data.meta_description: CLEVELAND â€” Another young Guardians player will make his major league debut after infielder Angel Martinez was recalled from Triple-A Columbus prior to the series opener against Toronto on Friday night.
